programme.title: Ernest ja Celestine
programme.desc: Müügimees Martin kutsub Ernesti Uude Kaubamajja esinema, kohapeal aga selgub, et sealne vana klaverilogu on täiesti häälest ära.(n)

programme.title: Džungliässad
programme.desc: Leiutaja Ernest mõtleb välja keeruka süsteemi, et endale tee jaoks vett keeta. Oma suureks ehmatuseks avastab ta, et on terve džungli ohtu seadnud.(n)

programme.title: Siilipoiss Alfredi salapärased seiklused
programme.desc: Alfred plaanib koos pere ja sõpradega piknikku, kuid nende plaanid nurjab tohutu sääseparv. Kui mõne aja pärast märgatakse nahkhiirte äkilist kadumist, hakkab putukarohkuse põhjus selguma.(n)

programme.title: Saara ja part
programme.desc: Saara ja Part lähevad parki joonistama ning avastavad, et üks unimütsist poiss on hõivanud nende lemmikpingi.(n)

programme.title: Jõulutaadi suured saladused
programme.desc: Mis sa arvad, kuidas ikkagi jõuab jõuluvana üheainsa õhtu jooksul kõigi maailma laste juurde kinke jagama? Mitu põhjapõtra on tema saani ees ja mitu päkapikust abilist elab tema võlulossis kaugel lumises Põhjalas? Ja kas jõulutaat vahel puhkusel ka käib? Kõigile neile ja veel paljudele teistele küsimustele leiad vastuse sellest südamlikust lastesarjast, mis toob igasse koju vahvaid laule ning mõnusa sooja jõulutuju.(n)

programme.title: Jõulutöökoda
programme.desc: Seekord valmistame kohe eriti uhke jõulukingi, mida tahaks saada igaüks.(n)

programme.title: Kroonitud peakesed
programme.desc: Tsaaritarid õpivad tundma ja kasvatama võlutaimi ning teevad noorendavatest õuntest kooki. Sel aga on ootamatud tagajärjed.(n)

programme.title: Tinka jõulumuinaslugu
programme.desc: Lapsed otsivad taga kuningas Gobbe vanimat poega Stormi. Bjergi avaldab Tinkale tõe tema päritolu kohta.(n)

programme.title: Homme tuleb homme
Zavtra budet zavtra
programme.desc: Kümneosalise nukufilmi lustakas lugu nelja sõbra - jutuka Pärdiku, tagasihoidliku Elevandipoja, ekstsentrilise Papagoi ja mõtliku Boa ettevõtmistest koduses džunglis, kus tihtilugu tuleb lahendada naljakaid paradokse, mis on seotud mitmetähenduslike sõnamängudega.(n)

programme.title: Peeter Paani uued seiklused
programme.desc: Londonis on jõulud ja Darlingite lapsed ehivad kuuske, kui kohale lendab Peeter ning teatab neile, et jõuluvana on just saabumas Eikunagimaale. Kapten Konkskäel valmib aga kurikaval plaan jõuluvana röövida ja niimoodi jõulud nurjata. Nüüd peavad Peeter ja tema sõbrad tegema kõik, et jõulud päästa.(n)

programme.title: Restoran 0
programme.desc: Kas vanast boilerist ja elektrikapist saab ehitada toimiva suitsuahju? Kas Viljandi aedadest annab kokku korjata maitsev õhtusöök? Ja kas savi tampimine on parim treening? Saatejuhid Ott Tomik, Märt Metsallik ja Hannes Praks. Režissöör Mikk Jürjens. Produtsent Eero Reinu.(n)

programme.title: Viin 1918: ühe keisririigi lõpp
Wien 1918 – Untergang und Neuanfang
programme.desc: Esimese maailmasõja lõpul kuulutatakse Viinis välja vabariik. Suurvõimu särav metropol käib alla. Kroonimaad on läinud, rahvas nälgib ja mässab, inflatsioon võtab viimase. Viin jääb endiselt kunsti, kultuuri ja teaduse linnaks, ent kuidas tunneb end vaesunud rahvas? Õnneks on säilinud fotosid, kirju ja filmidokumente, milles tuleb hästi esile kogu murranguaasta hiilgus ning viletsus.(n)

programme.title: Loodusepäev Osooniga
programme.desc: Elurikkuse all mõtleme bioloogilist mitmekesisust, mis kätkeb endas suurt hulka looma- ja taimeliike ning nende elupaiku. Meie keskendume puuseentele, mis väärivad tähelepanu selle poolest, et paljud neist on vääriselupaikade või põlismetsade indikaatorliigid. Suurem osa puuseentest toitub surnud puidust, nii vajavad nad oma eluks puutumata alasid, kus loodus toimetab omasoodu. Teejuhiks loodusfotograaf ja mükoloog Indrek Sell. Autor Kristo Elias, režissöör Keiti Väliste, operaator Madis Reimund, helirežissöör Taisto Uuslail, toimetaja-produtsent Õie Arusoo.(n)

programme.title: Metslased
programme.desc: Metslased lähevad jälle teele. Seekord läänest itta ja ikka jalgsi. Ligi 680 km imelist Eestit koos lõbusate ja tarkade inimestega. 25 päeva jagu uusi katsumusi, matkateadmisi, loodustarkust, kohtumisi loomadega ja eksperimente inimkehaga. Esimeses osas liigume koos president Kersti Kaljulaidiga Matsalus, loeme kokku linde, loodusfilmide režissöör Joosep Matjus avab põtrade maailma, katsume aru saada külapoe ees istumise fenomenist ja astume läbi vanast raudteejaamast, kuhu on ennast sisse seadnud skulptorid. Lisaks loodustarkusi ja palju muud. Sarja autor Lemo, operaatorid Manuel Mägi ja Lemo, tootja Tootmisguru OÜ.(n)

programme.title: Filmiklubi
programme.desc: Sissejuhatuse filmile "Segased Alabamas" teeb Moonika Siimets.(n)

programme.title: Segased Alabamas
Crazy in Alabama
programme.desc: R: Antonio Banderas. O: Melanie Griffith, David Morse. Staarnäitleja Antonio Banderase esimene lavastajatöö räägib teismelise poisi silmade läbi täiskasvanuks saamisest ja unistuste täitumistest ajal, mil Ameerika ühiskonda raputas kodanikuõiguste liikumine. 1960ndate rahutud aastad. Pealtnäha lihtsameelne koduperenaine Lucille (Griffith) otsustab lõpuks iseseisvuda ja teha teoks oma eluunistuse – saada glamuurseks Hollywoodi teletäheks. Ühel päeval on Alabama linnakesest kadunud nii Lucille kui ka tema vägivaldne abikaasa. See aga tekitab hulga vastamata küsimusi nii naise sugulastes kui ka võimukandjates. Mark Childressi romaanil põhinev draamakomöödia esilinastus Veneetsia filmifestivalil.(n)

programme.title: House At The End Of The Street
programme.desc: After her parents separate, Elissa moves with her mother to their dream house in the country. But the dream is disturbed when they learn that the house at the end of their street was the scene of a violent crime where a girl killed her parents.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: Two new York detectives, through a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, gain a reputation for being among the best city-wide, but things are not exactly as they were thinking, especially when they investigate David Ershon.

programme.title: Mr. Right
programme.desc: When she starts a relationship with a seemingly perfect man, the last thing Martha expects is for him to turn out to be an assassin. When the past comes back to haunt her new beau, Martha must make a choice as she is thrust into a manic world.

programme.title: Mad Money
programme.desc: Bridget Cardigan has an easy life, until her husband, Don, loses his high-paying job, and she is forced to work to pay off his debts. She finds a job as a cleaner at the Federal Reserve Bank in Kansas, leading her to come up with a plan to steal some money in order to keep her house, together with her colleagues Nina and Jackie.

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: When a massive earthquake hits California and leaves it in ruins, a search-and-rescue helicopter pilot embarks on a most perilous journey to find his wife and daughter amidst the ruins.

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: An action,thriller about a former criminal whose only daughter is kidnapped, forcing him to bring together his old crew to have his own justice after the police and society faileded to help him.

programme.title: Rock of Ages
programme.desc: A small-town girl arrives in Hollywood at the height of the 1980s rock-music scene and her encounter with a boy encourages them both to pursue their dreams.

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: When a heist goes south and ends in blood, Jimmy takes his adoptive brother Eli and goes on the run from a vengeful criminal. The brothers stumble into more trouble when young Jimmy uses a mysterious weapon to save his brother, attracting the attention of both the FBI and otherworldly figures.

programme.title: X-Men: First Class
programme.desc: In 1963, friends with supernatural powers (Charles Xavier) and (Erik Lensherr), known as Prof. X and Magento, worked together to find all individuals with supernatural abilities but the two sides soon split, splitting their followers into two warring teams.

programme.title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
programme.desc: X-Men are forced to travel to the past to try to change a very important and historic event that could negatively affect the future of mankind, as well as the future of the mutants known as X-Men.

programme.title: Dark Phoenix
programme.desc: It’s 1992, ten years after Jean Grey joined the X-Men. She begins to develop extraordinary powers that corrupt and she becomes The Dark Phoenix. Now the X-Men will have to decide if the life of a team member is worth more than all humankind.

programme.title: Europa Report
programme.desc: A Sci-fi ,adventure about a global team of astronauts going on a privately funded mission to Europa to search for life on Jupiter's biggest moon, but many unexpected surprises await them on this strange and wondrous moon.

programme.title: Backdraft II
programme.desc: The sequel to the 1991 hit follows Sean McCaffrey, a detective in the Chicago Fire Department, as he traces an arms dealer who uses fire as a distraction for his missile theft.

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: When a massive earthquake hits California and leaves it in ruins, a search-and-rescue helicopter pilot embarks on a most perilous journey to find his wife and daughter amidst the ruins.

programme.title: Stone
programme.desc: Gerald “ Stone” Creeson (Edward Norton) is a convicted arsonist who is spending time in prison. Desperate to get out, Stone has his wife Lucetta (Milla Jovovich) seduce his parole officer Jack Mabrey (Robert De Niro).Stone is playing a dangerous game as his attempts at psychological manipulation could conceivably backfire at any moment – so is the gamble worth the prize.

programme.title: X-Men: First Class
programme.desc: In 1963, friends with supernatural powers (Charles Xavier) and (Erik Lensherr), known as Prof. X and Magento, worked together to find all individuals with supernatural abilities but the two sides soon split, splitting their followers into two warring teams.

programme.title: Grace of Monaco
programme.desc: The biopic of Hollywood starlet Grace Kelly, who married Prince Rainier III of Monaco in April 1956. The film tracks a particularly trying time, during a political dispute in the 1960s between Rainier and French President Charles De Gaulle.

programme.title: Charlotte's Web
programme.desc: When Wilbur the pig learns of the dark fate that awaits him with the approaching winter, he enlists the help of the kindly spider Charlotte to make sure that he doesn't end up as a meal at the end of the year.

programme.title: Europa Report
programme.desc: A Sci-fi ,adventure about a global team of astronauts going on a privately funded mission to Europa to search for life on Jupiter's biggest moon, but many unexpected surprises await them on this strange and wondrous moon.

programme.title: xXx: State of the Union
programme.desc: (Darius Stone), a new agent for xXx program, is sent to Washington DC to defuse the power struggle between national leaders.

programme.title: xXx: The Return of Xander Cage
programme.desc: Xander Cage returns after self-imposed exile leaving an impression that he was long dead. He secretly works with his handler, Augustus Gibbons, and his team to recover a sinister and seemingly unstoppable weapon known as Pandora's box.

programme.title: Conan the Barbarian
programme.desc: In a mythical world, the personal revenge of the barbarian warrior Conan turns into an epic battle against all of his adversaries and enormous monsters, at the heart of impossible odds, becoming the only hope of saving the great nations of Hyboria from the domination of supernatural evil forces.

programme.title: Doctor Strange
programme.desc: After his career becomes at stake, Dr. Strange (Benedict Cumberbatch) an arrogant neurosurgeon, gets a new chance in life, where a great sorcerer trains him in order to protect the world from evil.

programme.title: Jonah Hex
programme.desc: In exchange for his own freedom, a bounty hunter is assigned by the U.S millitary to stop a terrorist who is ready to unleash Hell on Earth.

programme.title: De-Lovely
programme.desc: A biography of Cole Carter, his musical works and his unusual relationship with his wife.

programme.title: Dirty Rotten Scoundrels
programme.desc: Two con men try to resolve the rivalry between them through a bet, by picking a young girl who inherited fifty thousand dollars to be their target. Whoever deceives her and takes the money first, is the winner.

programme.title: Europa Report
programme.desc: A Sci-fi ,adventure about a global team of astronauts going on a privately funded mission to Europa to search for life on Jupiter's biggest moon, but many unexpected surprises await them on this strange and wondrous moon.

programme.title: Open Water
programme.desc: When the couple Susan and Daniel take a vacation in the Caribbean, their dream holiday turns into a nightmare, when they become stranded in the middle of the ocean during a scuba diving trip. As they have to battle to stay alive while bloodthirsty sharks surround them.

programme.title: Wild
programme.desc: With her life in shambles, Cheryl seeks a way out of her downward spiral by going on a solo hike on a journey of self-discovery and reevaluation of priorities.

programme.title: Where the Wild Things Are
programme.desc: Max is a young boy with an active imagination, when an accident happens to his sister Claire and her friends, he runs away dressed as a wolf in an imaginary world. Living with animals in the forest ,he meets Carol, who is very much like Max,he proclaims himself a king and magically fix their problems.

programme.title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
programme.desc: Before the events of Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope, and after the founding of the Galactic Empire, a group of rebels planned to carry out a very difficult task, which is to steal the charts of the Star of Death, a deadly weapon with high destructive power, which is owned by the empire.

programme.title: Green Lantern
programme.desc: A test pilot is granted a mystical green ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers, as well as membership into an intergalactic squadron tasked with keeping peace within the universe.

programme.title: Tarzan
programme.desc: The story of Tarzan, a young man who grew up in a family of gorillas, after his parents were killed by a leopard named Sabor. The gorillas raise him to grow up in their midst, and he becomes their hero after killing Sabor.

programme.title: Into the Storm
programme.desc: The town of Silverton is devastated by a wave of deadly tornadoes, and storm trackers predict the worst is yet to come. Meanwhile, a group of high school students document the events and aftermath of the disaster.

programme.title: Only the Brave
programme.desc: The film tells the story of a group of firefighters from the city of Prescott, Arizona, who responded to a massive fire in the city of Yarnell in June 2013, where the fires reached 19 members from the fire department team.

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: This thriller recounts how the U.S. container ship, the Maersk Alabama, headed by Captain Richard Phillips (Tom Hanks), became the first American ship to be hijacked in two hundred years when they come head to head with Somali pirates.

programme.title: Sully
programme.desc: Base on a true story, that took place on January 15, 2009, when the American pilot (Chesley 'Sully' Sullenberger) who managed to forced landing his plane above the Hudson River and saved the lives of 155 passengers on the plane, but despite his heroism and large risk in landing on the Hudson River, the disaster didn't end, where blowing winds from the authorities may destroy the live of the pilot himself.

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: FBI Hostage Rescue Team leader and U.S. war veteran Will Sawyer now assesses security for skyscrapers. He sets out on an assignment in China, where the tallest and safest building suddenly ablaze. Will must find those responsible, clear his name and somehow rescue his family who are trapped inside the building.

programme.title: Green Lantern
programme.desc: A test pilot is granted a mystical green ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers, as well as membership into an intergalactic squadron tasked with keeping peace within the universe.

programme.title: Into the Storm
programme.desc: The town of Silverton is devastated by a wave of deadly tornadoes, and storm trackers predict the worst is yet to come. Meanwhile, a group of high school students document the events and aftermath of the disaster.

programme.title: Tarzan
programme.desc: The story of Tarzan, a young man who grew up in a family of gorillas, after his parents were killed by a leopard named Sabor. The gorillas raise him to grow up in their midst, and he becomes their hero after killing Sabor.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: Will Smith and son Jaden co-star as the legendary Cypher and son Kitai, who crash land on an abandoned Earth a millennium after humanity's escape. With Cypher injured, teenage Kitai has to brave the hostile environment, brimming with aggressive evolved animal species and aliens, on his own to look for help.

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
programme.desc: A seventh installment to the series, with events taking place thirty years after the Battle of Endor and the events portrayed in Return of the Jedi.

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: This thriller recounts how the U.S. container ship, the Maersk Alabama, headed by Captain Richard Phillips (Tom Hanks), became the first American ship to be hijacked in two hundred years when they come head to head with Somali pirates.

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: FBI Hostage Rescue Team leader and U.S. war veteran Will Sawyer now assesses security for skyscrapers. He sets out on an assignment in China, where the tallest and safest building suddenly ablaze. Will must find those responsible, clear his name and somehow rescue his family who are trapped inside the building.

programme.title: Once
programme.desc: A struggling musician crosses path with an immigrant girl in Dublin, and together they share their love for music while gradually falling in love with each other.

programme.title: You're Not You
programme.desc: A classical pianist named Kate develops amyotrophic sclerosis, her social and psychological condition worsens, especially after her marriage is about to fail. She meets aspiring rock singer Bec, who volunteers to take care of her. Despite Kate's total reliance on Bec, they each have a different outlook on life.

programme.title: The Lucky One
programme.desc: A marine finds a picture in Iraq that helps him survive the dramatic battles. Getting back home, he tracks the girl in the picture which leads him to Louisiana. There he meets her and tries to explain his motives to find her.

programme.title: August: Osage County
programme.desc: The strong-willed women of the Weston family find themselves heading back to their childhood Oklahoma house, and the eccentric woman who raised them, following a family crisis. The events reveal many aspects of this family and the problems facing the women and their mother.

programme.title: Collateral Beauty
programme.desc: Howard Inlet, a successful New York advertising executive, suffers a great tragedy and retreats from his social life. While his concerned friends try desperately to reconnect with him, he seeks answers from the universe by writing letters to Love, Time and Death. But it's not until his notes bring unexpected responses from three unique visitors that he begins to understand how these three constants interlock in a life fully lived, and how even the deepest loss can reveal moments of meaning and beauty.

programme.title: Tarzan
programme.desc: The story of Tarzan, a young man who grew up in a family of gorillas, after his parents were killed by a leopard named Sabor. The gorillas raise him to grow up in their midst, and he becomes their hero after killing Sabor.

programme.title: Only the Brave
programme.desc: The film tells the story of a group of firefighters from the city of Prescott, Arizona, who responded to a massive fire in the city of Yarnell in June 2013, where the fires reached 19 members from the fire department team.

programme.title: Sully
programme.desc: Base on a true story, that took place on January 15, 2009, when the American pilot (Chesley 'Sully' Sullenberger) who managed to forced landing his plane above the Hudson River and saved the lives of 155 passengers on the plane, but despite his heroism and large risk in landing on the Hudson River, the disaster didn't end, where blowing winds from the authorities may destroy the live of the pilot himself.

programme.title: Solo: A Star Wars Story
programme.desc: The adventures of Han Solo and Chewbacca before joining the Rebellion and their encounters with the famous gambler Lando Calrissian, in a journey that will set the course of one of the Star Wars saga's most unlikely heroes.(n)

programme.title: August: Osage County
programme.desc: The strong-willed women of the Weston family find themselves heading back to their childhood Oklahoma house, and the eccentric woman who raised them, following a family crisis. The events reveal many aspects of this family and the problems facing the women and their mother.(n)

programme.title: The Lucky One
programme.desc: A marine finds a picture in Iraq that helps him survive the dramatic battles. Getting back home, he tracks the girl in the picture which leads him to Louisiana. There he meets her and tries to explain his motives to find her.(n)

programme.title: Behind Enemy Lines
programme.desc: Bored with his routine duties, Chris Burnett goes off course to check out a suspicious target, but when he gets spotted, Burnett becomes the target of the Serbian forces which are acting in breach of the peace treaty, and his last hope is for his commander to launch a rescue mission.(n)

programme.title: Rescue Dawn
programme.desc: A German/American plane goes out on a secret mission, but crashes in a forest during the Laos bombing of 1965. The plane's crew are taken as hostages and tortured by Vietcong forces. US Navy Pilot successfully plans an escape method for the hostages, but they face plenty of unforeseen events.(n)

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Fearing an inevitable defeat under Hitler's leadership, a group of German politicians and military officers plan a political coup and attempt to assassinate Hitler during World War II.(n)

programme.title: The Hateful Eight
programme.desc: A play-off on John Sturge's 1960 film "The Magnificent Seven". The movie is set at the end of the nineteenth century, about a group of people being held inside a ruined building because of a rough snowstorm. Rath (Kurt Russell), who works as an bounty hunter, was escorting Daisy Domergue (Jennifer Jason Leigh) to court and gets encountered by four strangers.(n)

programme.title: Live By Night
programme.desc: Set in 1962 Boston, where alcohol flows and bullets fly, a single man decides to leave his mark on the world when he discovers a world of underground distilleries, bars, gangs and corrupt police officers. In the meantime the son of a known police officer turns his back on his strict upbringing and gets involved with a dangerous mob.(n)

programme.title: You're Not You
programme.desc: A classical pianist named Kate develops amyotrophic sclerosis, her social and psychological condition worsens, especially after her marriage is about to fail. She meets aspiring rock singer Bec, who volunteers to take care of her. Despite Kate's total reliance on Bec, they each have a different outlook on life.(n)

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: After four ninja turtles are mutated by a mysterious alien substance, they must come out of the sewers to defend their city against forces of evil from both past and present.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln Loud tries to survive living among ten sisters, in their house where it’s always loud, crazy, and full of hilarious situations.

programme.desc: SpongeBob returns for more underwater adventures, driven along by his curiosity and his attempt to discover everything new in his world.

programme.title: Rusty Rivets
programme.desc: An engineer named Rusty leads a group of robots to solve problems and get out of difficult situations. He invents a dinosaur called Botasaur to try to rescue a friend in crisis.

programme.desc: Shimmer and Shine, are two magical genies, who cause all kinds of hilarious chaos trying to grant their human friend, Leah, her three daily wishes.

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: The Irish lady, Deirdre, forms a team of specialized mercenaries to retrieve a mysterious suitcase from dangerous criminals. After they successfully complete the mission, the suitcase gets switched by a member of the team who wants to sell it to the Russians.

programme.title: Bad Company
programme.desc: When a CIA agent is killed in a mission gone south, the agency recruits his previously-unknown identical twin brother, a street hustler, to take his place. A veteran agent is entrusted with his training and with convincing him to take on the dangerous mission.

programme.title: Thor: Ragnarok
programme.desc: Thor is imprisoned on the other side of the universe, where he finds himself racing against time to stop Ragnarök and the almighty Hela, who threatens to demolish his home Asgard.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: In the Hawaiian Islands, an international naval engage an intense battle against an alien species known as "The Regents". The aliens come to planet Earth to build a power source in the ocean.

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: After being imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, a street racer joins a cross-country race with a plan for revenge. When his ex-partner learns of his intentions, he places a bounty on his head as the race starts.

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: A drone repairman (Tom Cruise) is sent back to an evacuated Earth where a human-alien war sixty years ago wiped out half the planet. He makes a shocking discovery that causes him to question everything he knows about his world, his mission and himself.

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: Based on real life events in 1996, about a group of mountain climbers who have decided to challenge the hardest climate conditions on the globe and climb Everest. The climbing trip turned to be a deadly adventure due to a storm, which changed everything.

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
programme.desc: A seventh installment to the series, with events taking place thirty years after the Battle of Endor and the events portrayed in Return of the Jedi.

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: The Naval Fighter Weapons School witnesses a fierce competition between two students, nicknamed Maverick and Iceman, as they try to win the school's top trophy.

programme.title: Blackhat
programme.desc: After a case of high-level computer hacking arises, a man is released from prison to help American and Chinese authorities pursue a mysterious cyber criminal. The cat-and-mouse chase leads them from the U.S.A to Hong Kong.

programme.title: Sicario
programme.desc: In the border stretching between Mexico and the U.S.A, an area that has been always out of the reach of law, an idealistic FBI agent is assigned to aid in the escalating war against the cartel.

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: A gang plans a big heist with a group of corrupt cops, by calling in a 999 dispatch, which is code for “officer down” to lure out a rookie officer, in order for them to pull-off their heist – their plan take unforeseen turns when an unsuspected member has a change of mind.

programme.title: RoboCop
programme.desc: Set in a dystopian future where crime rates have become insanely high, evil corporation Omni Consumer Products tries to create a prototype that is half-robot and half-human. When RoboCop learns about their intrigues, he turns on his masters.

programme.title: الفيلم الوثائقي Marvel's Behind The Mask
Everest
programme.desc: Based on real life events in 1996, about a group of mountain climbers who have decided to challenge the hardest climate conditions on the globe and climb Everest. The climbing trip turned to be a deadly adventure due to a storm, which changed everything.

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
programme.desc: A seventh installment to the series, with events taking place thirty years after the Battle of Endor and the events portrayed in Return of the Jedi.

programme.title: Blackhat
programme.desc: After a case of high-level computer hacking arises, a man is released from prison to help American and Chinese authorities pursue a mysterious cyber criminal. The cat-and-mouse chase leads them from the U.S.A to Hong Kong.

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
programme.desc: As he attempts to rescue Princess Leia from Darth Vader, Luke Skywalker teams up with Han Solo and two droids to find the princess and destroy a powerful weapon made by the Galactic Empire.

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
programme.desc: As the Imperial fleet launches an attack on the Rebel Alliance base in Hoth, the spirit of Obi-Wan Kenobi sends Luke Skywalker to train under Yoda.

programme.title: Automation
programme.desc: When AUTO, a workspace robot, finds out that another advanced model will be taking his place, his fear of destruction drives him to a devastating rampage as he tries to protect his existence, leaving the factory workers scrambling to find safety and put an end to the killing spree.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: In 79 A.D., a slave turned gladiator races against time to save his beloved from marrying a corrupt Roman Senator, as Mount Vesuvius erupts in the Roman city of Pompeii.

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy 2
programme.desc: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 continues the team's adventures as they traverse the outer reaches of the cosmos. The Guardians must fight to keep their newfound family together as they unravel the mysteries of Peter Quill's true parentage. Old foes become new allies and favorite characters from the classic comics will come to the Guardians' aid as the Marvel cinematic universe continues to expand.

programme.title: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
programme.desc: Now in his twenties, John Connor is being hunted by a new female terminator, the T-X. A CSM-101 terminator is sent back in time to protect him just as the machines start to take over the world.

programme.title: World War Z
programme.desc: United Nations employee, Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt), must leave his family and traverse the world in a race against time to stop a Zombie pandemic that is crumbling armies and governments in its wake.

programme.title: Bringing Out the Dead
programme.desc: An overworked paramedic begins to hallucinate over a three-night shift. As he is haunted by the ghosts of those he failed to save, he must fight to hold onto his sanity.

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: In an apocalyptic world, prisoner Jensen Ames is forced to participate in a car race that is unlike any other. It's a race between armored cars on Terminal Island. In order to win the race, you must brutalize and murder all other competitors. But what if it's merely a trap.

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
programme.desc: As the Imperial fleet launches an attack on the Rebel Alliance base in Hoth, the spirit of Obi-Wan Kenobi sends Luke Skywalker to train under Yoda.

programme.desc: When AUTO, a workspace robot, finds out that another advanced model will be taking his place, his fear of destruction drives him to a devastating rampage as he tries to protect his existence, leaving the factory workers scrambling to find safety and put an end to the killing spree.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: In 79 A.D., a slave turned gladiator races against time to save his beloved from marrying a corrupt Roman Senator, as Mount Vesuvius erupts in the Roman city of Pompeii.

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy 2
programme.desc: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 continues the team's adventures as they traverse the outer reaches of the cosmos. The Guardians must fight to keep their newfound family together as they unravel the mysteries of Peter Quill's true parentage. Old foes become new allies and favorite characters from the classic comics will come to the Guardians' aid as the Marvel cinematic universe continues to expand.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
programme.desc: As the rebels rescue Han Solo and set out to destroy the second Death Star, Luke Skywalker tries to find a way to bring his father back from the dark side.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
programme.desc: Jedi Knights Qui-Gon Jinn and Obi-Wan Kenobi escape an aggressive attack during their quest for allies, and on their journey they come across the young boy, Anakin Skywalker, in whom they see a great talent that can restore balance to the Force.(n)

programme.title: King Arthur
programme.desc: The film revolves around the history and politics of the reign of King Arthur, during the collapse of the Roman Empire, the outbreak of skirmishes over power in countries far from the empire, and the role of the Knights of the Round Table.(n)

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: Charlie (Wahlberg), Stella (Theron) and their carefully selected team, plan a gold bar heist against their former ally-turned-enemy, Steve.(n)

programme.title: Dracula Untold
programme.desc: When the lives of his wife and child are put in danger by a bloodthirsty sultan, prince Vlad risks his soul to save them.(n)

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Marcus Burnett (Martin Lawrence), the quite family man and Mike Lowrey (Will Smith), the reckless ladies man are Miami policemen who are assigned to recover a $100 million drug shipment before it gets distributed and they have only 72 hours to do it.(n)

programme.title: 88 Minutes
programme.desc: Dr. Jack Gramm is a forensic psychologist whose testimony helps convict serial killer Jon Forster. As Forster's execution date looms closer, Gramm receives a call informing him that he only has 88 minutes to live.(n)

programme.title: Pain & Gain
programme.desc: A trio of bodybuilders in Florida gets caught up in an extortion ring and a kidnapping scheme that goes terribly wrong.(n)

programme.title: Alien³
programme.desc: When a fire breaks out on her spaceship, Ellen Ripley is launched in an escape pod that leads her to an all-male penal colony. She soon comes to realize that a new breed of the terrifying alien species that has terrorized her crew came with her, and it's out to kill the inmates.(n)

programme.title: Snake Eyes
programme.desc: Ricky, a corrupt cop with the dream of becoming mayor, finds himself in the middle of a murder conspiracy at a major boxing event. He tries to uncover the shocking murder plot, which becomes more shocking upon knowing its mastermind.(n)

The Score
programme.desc: An elderly thief, Nick Wells, is planning to retire and live off his accumulated wealth, but his mentor talks him into one last heist, which puts him at odds with the young crook Jackie.

programme.title: The Choice
programme.desc: Irfan is an idealistic professor who gets out of a job and he is in a dilemma as the doors close one by one in his face and he has to find a way to look after his sick son, even if this means getting into an inescapable dark adventure.

programme.title: Morning Glory
programme.desc: An out of work TV producer,is brought in to manage the "Daybreak" program ,only to discover that it will be cancelled by the end of the year and she was brought to manage it for the remaining months only, but she decides to bring it back to life with the help of the channel's best hosts.

programme.title: Mean Girls 2
programme.desc: A clique of popular girls, the Plastics, targets newcomer Jo after she befriends fellow student Abby, whom the queen bee of the popular girls sees as a rival. With an all-out war of dirty pranks and sabotage attempts, Jo and Abby decide to retaliate against the Plastics.

programme.title: The Social Network
programme.desc: This picture is a drama about the founding of the popular social network website “Facebook”. After breaking up with his girlfriend, Mark has the idea to create a website where Harvard students can rate the attractiveness of females at the school. Eventually, he launches a website with his friend Eduardo that allows people to look up their friends without violating privacy.

programme.title: S.M.A.R.T. Chase
programme.desc: When he gets ambushed during a mission to transport a precious Chinese antique, a private security agent must fight his way through brutal thugs to reclaim what he has lost; both the antique and his reputation.

programme.title: The Stepford Wives
programme.desc: Joanna and Walter are a married couple who are facing problems. As they move to an upscale community called Stepford as a last resort to save their marriage, they are shocked to discover that their idealistic vision of a community is hiding a dark secret.

programme.title: The Choice
programme.desc: Irfan is an idealistic professor who gets out of a job and he is in a dilemma as the doors close one by one in his face and he has to find a way to look after his sick son, even if this means getting into an inescapable dark adventure.

programme.title: The Bookshop
programme.desc: In 1959, Florence Green, a free-spirited widow, risks everything to open a bookshop, but she enters into clashes with the residents who never expected to lay hands on such venturesome books.

programme.title: The Time of Their Lives
programme.desc: Former Hollywood star Helen decides to use the help of her friend, Priscilla, to travel on a trip from London to France and attend the funeral of her ex-boyfriend. Many unexpected adventures and situations make their trip unforgettable.(n)

programme.title: S.M.A.R.T. Chase

programme.title: 2 Days in Paris
programme.desc: In an attempt to breathe some life back into their relationship, Marion and Jack decide to leave New York for a trip across Europe. But little do they know that their stay in Paris will be complicated by the presence of Marion's overbearing parents, as well as the appearance of several of her old flames.

programme.title: How To Lose A Guy In 10 Days
programme.desc: Journalist Andie Anderson specializes in writing topics of interest to women, but she wants to write about other things. She makes a deal with her boss that she would be free to write what she wants if she can write an article about what girls do wrong to spoil their relationship with guys.

programme.title: The Theory of Everything
programme.desc: Inspired by his ex-wife's memoirs, events revolve around the stunning story of the life and achievements of the inspiring physicist Stephen Hawking, despite his motor neurone disease, with a special focus on his relationship with his ex-wife, Jane Wilde.

programme.title: Crypto
programme.desc: Following a demotion, a Wall Street banker manages to find clues that unravel a global conspiracy. As he dives into the layers of corruption taking over New York, he soon finds his career, his life, and his family in peril.

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: Chuck works at a large courier company, and is in love with his girlfriend, Kelly. He plans to propose to her on Christmas, but is required to go to Malaysia for an urgent work assignment. The plane he's on crashes on the way, leaving Chuck as the only survivor on a deserted island, where it is up to him to protect both his own body and his own mind, by holding on to dreams of getting back.

programme.title: All Creatures Here Below
programme.desc: After running into trouble, the struggling young couple Gensan and Ruby seek refuge in their hometown of Kansas City, where they're faced with dark secrets from the past.

programme.title: Zookeeper
programme.desc: When the zookeeper decides to quit winning back his ex-girlfriend, the animals try to teach him the ways of love.

programme.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
programme.desc: Ferris pretends to be sick so he doesn't go to school, and he persuades his girlfriend Sloane and his friend Cameron to go to Chicago to spend time there to help him heal. The triple go with the car of Cameron's father, and events take a comic turn.

programme.title: Keeping the Faith
programme.desc: The friendship and faith of a priest and a rabbi are tested when they both fall for an old friend. As both men struggle between upholding their duties and following their hearts.

programme.title: A Dog's Breakfast
programme.desc: Patrick is a single man who lives with his dog Mars. When his sister visits to introduce him to her TV star fiancé, things spiral out of control when Patrick thinks that he might've killed him by mistake.

programme.title: Romy And Michele's High School Reunion
programme.desc: Rummy and Mitchell are high school friends, who do not separate even when they have been ridiculed and harassed by their classmates. When they are invited to the reunion ceremony ten years after graduation, they discover that their lives are not as good as they wanted, so they decide to go to school with businessmen clothes, mobile phones and fake success stories. Hence many paradoxes.

programme.title: What's Love Got to Do with It
programme.desc: The story of Tina Turner's rise to stardom, from her unhappy upbringing, to her meeting her future husband, pop star Ike Turner, to their troubled relationship as Ike grows abusive.

programme.title: Into the Blue 2: The Reef
programme.desc: When they are hired by an investor to look for Columbus' hidden treasure under the sea, married couple Sebastian and Dani find themselves in the midst of a large conspiracy when they discover that the treasure is actually a nuclear warhead.

programme.title: It's a Hard Truth Ain't It
programme.desc: A documentary that follows 13 inmates at Indiana's Pendleton Correctional Facility as they learn filmmaking so as to tell their stories that ended with their incarceration.

programme.title: All Creatures Here Below
programme.desc: After running into trouble, the struggling young couple Gensan and Ruby seek refuge in their hometown of Kansas City, where they're faced with dark secrets from the past.

programme.title: Champion
programme.desc: The story follows the journey of the ambitious boxer Midge Kelly from his humble beginnings until his rise to fame, as he stops at nothing to get what he wants.

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: The biography of mathematician John Forbes Nash, Jr. (Russell Crowe) since he was a university student, through his academic work and research achievements, his love story with his student Alicia (Jennifer Connelly) who became his wife and his bitter struggle with paranoid schizophrenia.

programme.title: Throw Momma from the Train
programme.desc: Miserable literature teacher and author Larry and his no-less-miserable student Owen make a bizarre deal; Larry is to kill Owen’s overbearing mother, whereas Owen is to kill Larry’s evil ex-wife.

programme.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: Dantes is falsely accused by his best friend Fernand and is imprisoned in an island prison for 13 years. Dantes escapes and transforms himself into a rich count and dreams of only one thing: revenge.

programme.title: The Founder
programme.desc: The true story of how one man, Ray Kroc, turned a burger joint into one of the biggest food-chains in the world, turning McDonald's from a small, albeit popular, walk-up restaurant run by the brothers Mac and Dick McDonald into a franchise worth billions.

programme.title: She's Funny That Way
programme.desc: A married Broadway director falls for a prostitute-turned-actress and decides to professionally adopt her, while she in turn is having another affair simultaneously with the writer of the play they're working on.

programme.title: The Place Beyond the Pines
programme.desc: A motorcycle stunt rider (Ryan Gosling) makes a fateful decision to carry out robberies to support his girlfriend and baby. When a rookie cop (Bradley Cooper) pursues him, the two become locked on a tense collision course whose devastating consequences will impact their families for years to come.

programme.title: The Last King of Scotland
programme.desc: The film deals with the life of the Ugandan dictator ( Idi Amin) and his brutality from the point of view of his own physician during the 1970s.

programme.title: Be Cool
programme.desc: Chili Palmer returns back to the music business after years of working in the movie industry, and decides to help Edie Athens, his friend's widow, revive her late husband's record company, to pay of a debt owed to a producer. Chili depends on singer and songwriter Linda Moon's talents who asks him to help her cancel her contract with Nick Carr and Raji, who quickly become Chili's enemies.

programme.title: The Boy, the Dog and the Clown
programme.desc: After the loss of his father, the grieving Adrien meets a clown who teaches him magical tricks. But when Adrien gets lost in the woods, magic becomes his only way to be rescued.(n)

programme.title: Between Waves
programme.desc: Rick Gray returns to his coastal hometown, hoping that a return to his roots will help to reinvigorate him and combat his midlife crisis. As he reconnects with the friends of his youth, he embarks on a journey that will see him reevaluate his life and confront his choices.(n)

programme.title: G.I. Joe: Retaliation
programme.desc: In this sequel, the G.I Joes are not only fighting their mortal enemy Cobra; they are forced to contend with threats from within the government that jeopardize their very existence.(n)

programme.title: Father of the Bride Part II
programme.desc: As George struggles to accept his daughter's impending motherhood and what it says about his own role in her life, a rather unexpected dilemma further complicates his life when he discovers that his own wife is pregnant.(n)

programme.title: Pearl Harbor
programme.desc: The film follows the love lives of two childhood friends who become Air Force Pilots, and are split when one volunteers to fight in Britain, and the other, along with his friend's lover, is transferred to Pearl Harbor, shortly before the Japanese attack on the place.(n)

programme.title: Boyhood
programme.desc: Mason and Olivia are a divorced couple trying to raise their young son, Mason Jr. The film follows the boy's life for twelve years, from first grade at age 6, till the twelfth grade, examining his relationship with his parents all the way through.(n)

programme.title: Papillon
programme.desc: In the wake of a wrongful murder conviction, Henry is sent to a remote penitentiary colony. Once there, he soon comes to bond with another inmate, Louis Dega. Together, they plan for their escape.(n)

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine
programme.desc: Three down-on-their-luck friends, Adam, Nick, and Lou, go to a winter resort and accidentally end back in 1986 after a hot tub takes them back in time to a fateful night. They have to do everything the exact same way, so that Adam's nephew can be born.(n)

programme.title: Lars and the Real Girl
programme.desc: Lars is an extremely socially awkward man who lives with his brother and his sister-in-law. One day, he announces that he now has a girlfriend, whom he met online, much to everyone’s delight, only for them to discover that it’s actually a life-size doll.(n)

programme.title: Paper Spiders
programme.desc: In the wake of losing her husband, Dawn experiences growing anxiety after she learns that her daughter, Melanie, is moving away for college, after which Melanie attempts to help her mother with her paranoid delusions that threaten to jeopardize their loving bond.

programme.title: Secrets in the Snow
programme.desc: Excited about finally meeting her beloved Ted's family in a snowy countryside, Christina makes her way from Chicago only to be surprised at an unexpected visit from a guest who is holding secrets behind the death of Ted's brother, Paul.

programme.title: Love at the Shore
programme.desc: In an attempt to finish her new novel, single mom Jenna decides to seize the chance of their beach vacation to meet her deadline. programme.title: Mighty Oak
programme.desc: Years after her brother dies, Gina runs across the music prodigy Oak Scoggins. While anyone would only be taken by Oak's talent, Gina sets her eyes on reuniting her old band as she becomes convinced that Oak is actually the reincarnation of her late brother.

programme.title: Bad Boys for Life

programme.title: Remember Me

programme.desc: Isabel runs an orphanage in the Indian city of Kolkata, but she desperately needs money to keep the shelter in place, she travels to New York City to meet a benefactor who might help her with funding.

programme.title: Green Book
programme.desc: In 1962, Tony "Tony Lip” (Viggo Mortensen), an Italian-American tough bouncer, is hired to be the driver for the African-American classical pianist Dr. Don Shirley (Mahershala Ali) for a concert tour into the Deep South states. Because of America's racial segregation, Shirley relies on The Negro Motorist Green Book to guide them to small hotels, restaurants and gas stations. As the disparate pair witness and endure America's appalling injustices on the road, they find a newfound respect for each that opens their eyes to the world around them.

programme.title: Body Cam

programme.desc: Amanda is left reeling from the sudden death of her sister Lauren. When she grows to suspect foul play in her death, she is shocked when evidence points to Lauren's own son, Charlie, sending Amanda on a journey to search for the truth about her sister's family.

programme.title: Dead Over Diamonds: Picture Perfect Mysteries
programme.desc: When a diamond necklace is stolen, Det. Sam enlists the help of the photographer Allie to find it. The last thing they expect during their investigation is for it to point them straight to an unexpected death.

programme.title: You Again
programme.desc: Marni is a successful businesswoman who returns to her hometown for the marriage of her older brother. She finds that he's about to marry the girl who bullied her in high school. Things get worse when Marni's mother comes face-to-face with the girl's aunt, who was also bothering her in high school.

programme.title: How To Lose A Guy In 10 Days
programme.desc: Journalist Andie Anderson specializes in writing topics of interest to women, but she wants to write about other things. She makes a deal with her boss that she would be free to write what she wants if she can write an article about what girls do wrong to spoil their relationship with guys.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery
programme.desc: Hailey Dean, who was working in the attorney general's office, decides to quit her job to work as a counselor in marital affairs and a psychiatrist.

programme.title: Dream House Nightmare
programme.desc: What was supposed to be a lucky purchase for a married couple turns into a nightmare when they discover that their dream house is coveted by an unstable woman who is willing to do anything to force them out.

programme.title: Official Secrets
programme.desc: In the run-up to the invasion of Iraq, British Intelligence whistle-blower Katharine Gun leaked a memo about a joint spying between the US and UK, proposing to blackmail smaller member states to vote for the war in Iraq. Journalist Martin Bright published that document in The Observer newspaper and the Security Council was outraged.

programme.title: Wendy
programme.desc: As Wendy ends up on a mysterious island where children can not grow old, the joy that hangs around the ever-youthful children begins to sour when an accident turns Wendy's brother resentful, threatening to change the very nature of the island and the everlasting youth it grants.

programme.title: Hit and Run
programme.desc: A former gateway driver for a gang is enrolled in Witness Protection. When he gives his guard the slip in order to drive his girlfriend to an interview in LA, their field trip gets more complicated as they are pursued by a former acquaintance and a US Marshall.

programme.title: Mama
programme.desc: Two sisters are discovered in a decrepit cabin after having gone missing for five years following their mother's murder. They move in with their uncle and his girlfriend, who can't help but fear the girls aren't the only new guests in their home.

programme.title: The Girl on the Train
programme.desc: A troubled divorcée gets tangled up in a dangerous web of secrets and lies, after she witnesses something shocking while taking the train.

programme.title: Never Rarely Sometimes Always
programme.desc: When one of them falls pregnant and is pursued by people who want her to have a divorce, two teenage girls flee Pennsylvania and head to New York City to seek the necessary medical help.

programme.title: The Age of Adaline
programme.desc: Adaline Bowman (Blake Lively) is born in the early 1920s. After an accident, she becomes ageless. She remains 29 years old for eight decades, and after years of isolation, she meets a man who rekindles her passion for life. She spends a weekend with his parents, and finds her secret threatened.

programme.title: Anniversary Nightmare
programme.desc: When she wakes up on her 10th anniversary and finds herself in Hawaii, things rapidly escalate for Liz as she finds her husband dead while she is accused of murdering him. She sets out to prove herself innocent by finding the true culprit.

programme.title: Share
programme.desc: When she accidentally discovers a disturbing video from a night she can't remember, 16-year-old Mandy tries to figure out what happened and how quickly everything came down around her.

programme.title: The Convenient Groom
programme.desc: When Kate's fiancé leaves her, she finds herself in a dilemma since their publicized marriage is about to happen, and the issue could threaten her image as a relationship expert. A childhood friend, who harbors a secret crush on her, steps up as a replacement groom to help her save face.

programme.title: Jinn
programme.desc: When an old family curse starts to haunt Shawn, he finds unlikely sources of help in the form of a shackled mental patient and two strangers who claim to have answers. But the answers he seeks offer no solace as he is forced to go head-to-head with a terrifying force to save his family.

programme.title: Primal Fear
programme.desc: Martin Vail, a defense attorney, takes on a case where an altar boy is accused of brutally murdering an archbishop. When Martin starts investigating the case, he learns that it is more complicated and layered than he has initially anticipated.

programme.title: Betrayed
programme.desc: When a radio personality is murdered in Chicago, the FBI agent Catherine Weaver is sent undercover to infiltrate a group of white supremacists, meeting the prime suspect, Gary Simmons. Soon enough, her suspicions and belief in his involvement diminish, giving way for love to blossom between them.

programme.title: Lady-Like
programme.desc: Allie is a brilliant college student who has trouble fitting in. When her best friend starts dating, Allie is left aimless as she used her friend as a social crutch, leaving her to navigate her path to adulthood on her own.

programme.title: Killer Under the Bed
programme.desc: After her father dies, Kilee moves with her mother and sister to a new city, as she struggles to adapt to her new life. Things take a turn when Kilee finds a doll riddled with pins in her backyard that she believes holds supernatural powers.(n)

programme.title: While You Were Sleeping
programme.desc: Lucy is a lonely worker at the train station,who secretly like Peter, one of the passengers . Lucy saves his life on Christmas, but then he goes into a coma. His family mistakenly thinks Lucy is his fiancée while his younger brother, Jack, suspects it, despite the whole family's admiration for Lucy.(n)

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle Of Life
programme.desc: The British Intelligence recruits archaeologist Lara Croft on a mission to get to Pandora's box, which has the most dangerous disease known to mankind. Evil scientist Jonathan has his sights set on the box as well, and Lara Croft agrees to face him on the condition that the Intelligence release the man she is in a relationship with.(n)

programme.title: 10 Things I Hate About You
programme.desc: A new student must find someone to date the most depressing girl in school, in order to take her little sister, who he likes, on a date, who's not allowed to date anyone till her older sister is on a date first.(n)

programme.title: Bombshell
programme.desc: A group of women try to take on Fox News head, Roger Ailes, due to his administration policy and the toxic male culture he is spreading in the network.(n)

programme.title: Lady Macbeth
programme.desc: Adapted from Nikolai Leskov's Lady Macbeth of the Mtsensk District, the movie depicts the life of a young woman stifled by her marriage of convenience to a man twice her age. Confined and left behind by her husband, she starts a romance with a young man from the estate.(n)

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: A high school senior, who's treated as an outcast by her classmates, lives with her religious fanatic mother who wants to isolate her from the world. When Carrie finds out that she posses telekinetic powers, she unleashes her anger on all those who did her wrong.(n)

programme.title: Child's Play
programme.desc: Karen gives her son, Andy, an AI toy doll branded as "Buddi" for his birthday, which Andy calls "Chucky ". Andy starts to feel something is wrong with it, as it develops a very sinister mind of its own.(n)

programme.title: Mothers' Instinct
programme.desc: The Alice and Celine families live in Brussels in the 1960s, but when Celine's son dies in a tragic accident, Celine blames her neighbor Alice for not helping him, and Alice feels that her neighbor is trying to take revenge on her son Theo.(n)

programme.title: Crazy Heart
programme.desc: The life of a faded country music singer takes a turn after years of hazy days and lonely nights of singing in pubs, as a beautiful, sympathetic reporter arrives in town, writing a new vividly bright shade into the book of his colorless life.(n)

programme.title: Chocolat
programme.desc: Vianne Rocher (Juliette Binoche) moves with her daughter to the countryside of France, where she opens a chocolate shop. The village women begin to buy her products, which angers the mayor . Meanwhile, a Gypsy band comes to the village , including Roux (Johnny Depp), who falls in love with her.(n)

programme.title: Ho Ho Animals
programme.desc: In a remote forest, a group of animals that includes a large number of bears and monkeys comes together to embark on a series of thrilling adventures.

programme.title: Help And Freedom
programme.desc: An animated family comedy that follows the daily routine of a group of animals. The distinct quality of these animals, however, is that like any human being, they have the primary instinct to want to make something out of their lives.

programme.title: Kurt Turns Evil
programme.desc: Kurt discovers that society doesn't appreciate forklift operators. When he finds everyone around him has respectable jobs, he decides to turn to a life of crime and become vicious.

programme.title: Catcher: Cat City 2
programme.desc: Stanley the investigative journalist mouse finds the ancient cat tribe in the Pafrican Jungle and realizes that the fate of mice civilization is still under threat.

programme.title: The Emperor's Secret
programme.desc: The inhabitants of a small Finnish village find themselves forced to defend their town against the tyrannical emperor who wishes to confiscate the swiveling wheel. When they resist him, he sends them to a barren island. Now, it's up to Pavo to lead them to safety and fight the evil emperor.

programme.title: The Secret of Kells
programme.desc: Little Brendan lives far away under the siege of barbarian raids during the Middle Ages. But a new life of adventures begins when a famous master illuminator arrives, bringing with him an unfinished ancient book full of wisdom and secrets.

programme.title: Cop Dog/ Marlowe
programme.desc: When a cop is killed, his young son tries to uncover the mystery of his murder with the aid of his dog, as a band of thieves goes after the family as revenge against the father.

programme.title: Khan Kluay 2
programme.desc: In a battle, Jumbo, the King's elephant, loses both of his parents. When he attempts to distract himself from his sadness by embarking on a series of escapades, he makes a decision that completely changes his life.

programme.desc: Marco Macaco works as a beach officer and loves the beautiful Lulu, who's fascinated by Marco's rival, Carlo, who builds a gigantic monkey-shaped casino on Marco's beach. Marco discovers Carlo's evil plans and tries to stop him.(n)

programme.title: Operation Arctic
programme.desc: Three siblings find themselves alone on the island of Spitsbergen, where they must join hands to survive a severe snowstorm on one hand and predator bears on the other.(n)

programme.title: Krazzy Planet
programme.desc: Life on planet Krazzy,is full of fun and prosperity,until a galaxy tyrant decides to invade the planet. Two brave heroes team up with a scientist to confront the invasion attempt to show the true essence of the people of planet Krazzy.(n)

programme.title: Funny Little Cars

programme.title: High Life
programme.desc: Set in the future beyond the solar system, a group of criminals accept a space mission in which they become subjects of a human reproduction experiment. But they find themselves in an unthinkable position when their space ship hits a storm of cosmic rays.

programme.title: Between Worlds
programme.desc: The trucker Joe finds himself facing an unusual situation after he is recruited to help a spiritually-gifted mother save her comatose daughter, Billie. But Billie is possessed by the spirit of Joe's late wife, who is not about to relinquish her hold on Billie as she still has business to attend to.

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Fearing an inevitable defeat under Hitler's leadership, a group of German politicians and military officers plan a political coup and attempt to assassinate Hitler during World War II.

programme.title: Identity
programme.desc: Ten strangers end up stranded at a deserted motel, and find themselves murdered one by one. Before more of them die, they need to find out who the murderer is.

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: On the Amazon river, a documentary crew is set upon by a dangerous man who claims to know the location of the tribe they want to film. However, as the man misleads them into dangerous territory, they come to discover that he is on the hunt for a deadly Anaconda, placing them all in peril.

programme.title: The Art of War
programme.desc: Shaw is a secret agent working for the United Nations to keep things peaceful and cooperative. A boat of murdered Vietnamese refugees arrives at an American beach, and an assassination attempt targets the ambassador of China during the signing of an American-Chinese agreement. Shaw gets unwillingly involved in the crime, and starts to look for the true criminal to remove suspicions from himself.

programme.title: Reprisal
programme.desc: In the wake of his coworker's death during a bank heist, a bank manager, Jacob, enlists the help of his neighbor, an ex-cop called James, to locate the perpetrator of the crime, only for the perpetrator to raise the stakes when he kidnaps Jacob's wife and daughter.

programme.title: The Remains
programme.desc: An unsuspecting family moves to an old Victorian home, unaware that a chest in their attic has antiques possessed by an evil spirit that soon possesses each family member as it grows stronger and nearly achieves its malevolent goal: to kidnap the children.

programme.title: Possum
programme.desc: Phillip, a puppeteer, has a troubled past and a fixation on a creepy puppet that he works with. When he is forced to confront his past and his evil step-father after he returns to his childhood home, he soon comes to discover that confronting the demons of his past can have dire consequences.

programme.title: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: As the last of the Air Nomads, Aang, who is also an Avatar who can master the art of bending all elements, embarks on a journey to master Waterbending with the help of siblings Sokka and Katara. On their tail comes the Fire Nation who wage war on the Earth Kingdom and the Water Tribes.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: Two new York detectives, through a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, gain a reputation for being among the best city-wide, but things are not exactly as they were thinking, especially when they investigate David Ershon.

programme.title: American Hustle
programme.desc: In the late 1970s, FBI agent Richie DiMaso forces con artists Irving and Sydney to devise an elaborate sting operation on corrupt politicians.

programme.title: The Boondock Saints II: All Saints Day
programme.desc: After assassinating Italian mob boss, Joe Yakavetta, the MacManus brothers, Connor and Murphy, along with their father Noah, fled to Ireland. After several years of living in peace, their uncle Sibeal informs them that their beloved priest has been assassinated in Boston and the brothers have been implicated in the murder. Connor and Murphy decide to return to the U.S. to find out what really happened and seek justice for the priest.

programme.title: Man on Fire

However, as the man misleads them into dangerous territory, they come to discover that he is on the hunt for a deadly Anaconda, placing them all in peril.

programme.title: Between Worlds
programme.desc: The trucker Joe finds himself facing an unusual situation after he is recruited to help a spiritually-gifted mother save her comatose daughter, Billie. But Billie is possessed by the spirit of Joe's late wife, who is not about to relinquish her hold on Billie as she still has business to attend to.

programme.desc: Fearing an inevitable defeat under Hitler's leadership, a group of German politicians and military officers plan a political coup and attempt to assassinate Hitler during World War II.

programme.desc: David, a teenager with teleportation abilities, finds himself in a local library where he discovers his ability to 'jump' from one place to another. He decides to make use of this newly-acquired ability to leave his abusive father and plan a stable life for himself.

programme.title: Pyewacket
programme.desc: A thriller about a frustrated daughter who chooses to perform a supernatural ritual to get rid of her mother because of their strained relationship together. But her ritual evokes an evil presence that unleashes its occult destruction.

programme.desc: International spy Ethan Renner (Kevin Costner) decides to leave his risky life behind to build a stronger relationship with his daughter and wife. but Ethan has to complete one final mission before he retires , to catch the most dangerous terrorist in the world, while taking care of his daughter.

programme.title: My Super Ex-Girlfriend
programme.desc: When Matt dumps Jenny, who is on the needy side, she uses her superpowers to make his life miserable.

programme.title: Évolution
programme.desc: When he makes a startling discovery, young Nicholas starts to question his surroundings and the secrets behind his community, which consists solely of women and boys, all of whom conform to the same mysterious rules. What dark secrets lie beyond their seemingly idyllic island life.

programme.title: Colossal
programme.desc: A jobless girl, Gloria, is prompted to leave her life in New York and head back to her hometown. As the news reports announce the emergence of a colossal creature threatening to unleash terrors on the city of Seoul, Gloria gradually realizes that she's mysteriously connected to the creature.

programme.title: Gone Girl
programme.desc: On the occasion of his fifth wedding anniversary, Nick Dunne reports that his wife, Amy, has gone missing. Under pressure from the police and a growing media frenzy, Nick's portrait of a blissful union begins to crumble. Soon his lies, deceits and strange behavior have everyone asking the same dark question: Did Nick Dunne kill his wife.
